review: I usually stream video through our blue ray players, but I wanted something to stream video without taking up the counter space in my kitchen.  I love this, it streams faster and with less buffering than the blue ray player.  I love all of the apps available for streaming video, and music.  I am buying one of these for my daughter when she goes to college.  This is the best streaming device I have ever used.  I highly recommend it.
